name: Knock Away
description:
Boring afternoon, uninteresting meeting? Why not come and knock away something to kill time?
Endlessly fun and fast speed waiting for you to explore!
It's time to make a finger twister!

Game feature:
>Exciting game play, do not miss every blocks!
>Catch the combo chance, rush to high scores!

Tips:
>Don't touch the cross blocks.
>Crash every 3 star-blocks, you will get a combo chance, then tap as fast as possible!

That's it. Go ahead and have fun!
